EmailTemplate.name: No contact 2nd Attempt
EmailTemplate.subject: Intuit: Sorry I missed you today!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Account #{!Contact.CAN__c}
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I attempted to reach you by phone today but unfortunately missed you again. What date and time works best for you so that I can accommodate your busy schedule?
If you would prefer that I work with someone else during the installation of QuickBooks, your help in directing me to them would be greatly appreciated!
It’s important that we get you successfully transitioned to your new QuickBooks Enterprise software as quickly and efficiently as possible to minimize interruption of your business.
Thank you for your time and assistance.
I look forward to helping you successfully transition to your new QuickBooks Enterprise Software.
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} | Enterprise Account Manager Work Phone: {!User.Phone} ext {!User.Extension} | {!User.Email}
Intuit | simplify the business of life
this transmittal is intended only for the use of the individual or entity to which it is addressed and may contain information that is privileged, confidential and exempt from disclosure under applicable law. If the reader of this transmittal is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible for delivering the transmittal to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any dissemination, distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited.
